Base.name: Name
Home.About.title: About us
Home.Introduce.investfunny: Investing has never been easier and more fun
Home.Introduce.paregraph1: We have developed a complete set of simple and efficient investment strategies for different markets, and are constantly improving and expanding. Provide one-stop services from strategy research, winning rate backtesting, success rate reporting, investment signal monitoring, etc.
Home.Introduce.paregraph2: The investment market has long entered the era of quantitative investment, and it is difficult for investors without a background in computer technology to take advantage of the tools provided by the era. We solve digital technology problems for you, while you only need to focus on your investment strategy.

Home.Login.validpasswd: At least five characters, including one uppercase, one lowercase letter, and one number
